DOC.brief_summary: This study aim find endophenotypes schizophrenia neuronal level obtain stem cell derive adipose cell subject heavy genetic load schizophrenia differentiate neuronal cell .
DOC.brief_title: Stem Cell Research Subjects Genetic High Risk Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: [ Subjects genetic high risk schizophrenia ] Healthy without Axis I mental disorder Is monozygotic twin patient schizophrenia OR Has least two family member schizophrenia pedigree , include least one 1stdegree family member [ Healthy Control ] Healthy without Axis I mental disorder No family member schizophrenia pedigree 3rd degree Significant neurological medical illness Psychotic symptom Substance abuse Suicidal risk Blindness hearing loss Taking aspirin , warfarin hormonal agent Pregnancy lactation Susceptibility keloid formation Allergy lidocaine History significant head trauma loss consciousness Mental retardation
